line_1: From piercing winds, and scorching heats.
line_2: And to the Sabine hill retreats:

line_1: And when his Skill perceives the slaking Heats,
line_2: While the slow Pulse with equal Motion beats,

line_1: How zeal in Priscus nothing more than heats,
line_2: In Codex burns, and ruins all it meets;

line_1: The Midnight Watches, and the Noon-day Heats.
line_2: That chearfully its Labours pass'd forgets,

line_1: The Change of Seasons, and Increase of Heats:
line_2: Fixt on the glorious Action, He forgets

line_1: In Spring the Loves enkindle mutual Heats,
line_2: The feather'd Nation chuse their tuneful Mates,
